text:
e="preserve">V. Chandrakumar (– 7 April 2020), better known as Sasi Kalinga, was an Indian actor. He worked in Malayalam cinema. His acting credits include ' (2009), "Pranchiyettan & the Saint" (2010), "Indian Rupee" (2011), "Adaminte Makan Abu" (2011) and in "Amen" (2013).
Kalinga died from liver disease in Kozhikode on 7 April 2020. He was reportedly 59.
